綱.definition: head rope of a fishing net; guiding principle; key link; class (taxonomy); outline; program

綱舉目張.definition: if you lift the headrope the meshes spread open (idiom); take care of the big things and the little things will take care of themselves; (of a piece of writing) well-structured and ordered

綱領.definition: program (i.e. plan of action); guiding principle
